name: Signup and Login with multiple dynamic users

steps.name: Given  I prepare a unique user with email prefix "qaauto" and password "Password@1"
Then  validate signup response code is 200 and message contains "User created successfully"
Signup succeeded. Message: User created successfully
When  user tries to login using the same email prefix "qaauto" and password "Password@1"
Then  verify the login response code is 200 and message contains "access_token"
